snippet: Pitcher Hiroki Kuroda made his first spring training start for the Yankees against the Rays in Tampa, Fla., giving up three runs in two innings.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Hiroki Kuroda makes his spring training debut against the Tampa Bay Rays, giving up three runs in two innings.
lead_paragraph: Pitcher Hiroki Kuroda made his first spring training start for the Yankees against the Rays in Tampa, Fla., giving up three runs in two innings.

headline.seo: Hiroki Kuroda of Yankees Makes Spring Training Debut
headline.main: Results Prove Modest in First Start for Kuroda
headline.print_headline: Results and Media Crowd Are Modest for Kuroda
